sentences.english: Food and water ran short, power blacked out.

sentences.english: The product can be used piping system shut-off valve, control valves and check valves.

sentences.english: So, let’s recap. How close are these cables to the ground, again?

sentences.english: It can block and relieve forenamed variety by disbranching vagus nerve and depressor nerve.

sentences.english: The end is cut at an angle and shaved regularly as it wears out.

sentences.english: He pioneered the surgical technique called frontal lobotomy.
